# grid2img

```
I = grid2img(G::GMTgrid{<:Unsigned})
```

Converts a {{< gmtref GMTgrid type=gmttype >}} of type Unsigned into a {{< gmtref GMTimage type=gmttype >}}.
Data array is not copied nor its type is changed.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

```
